page.shortlink: server view dlg hdate dialog component
page.description: The DLG_HDATE dialog component sets the "from" date to use in the filter expression that selects records for the GRD_HISTCUST and GRD_HISTQUAN grid components.

section.title: Discussion
section.description: The DLG_HDATE dialog component contains a text box control formatted as a popup calendar control and a submit button.
